ygData.subject: Re: Lvl 48 song ?
ygData.msgSnippet: The level 48 DoT is a great song. Just don t use it when grouped with an enchanter - they won t like it much. =) I went to Sol A after the Temple Ro patch to
ygData.messageBody:
The level 48 DoT is a great song. Just don't use it when grouped with an
enchanter - they won't like it much. =)

I went to Sol A after the Temple Ro patch to get my fiery vambraces/boots.
Took me two days. I was alone and had no problem and I barely ever used a
weapon. I equipped the lute and twisted the lvl 48 DoT, lvl 2 DoT, and Hymn,
switching to Chains before they started running (oh yeah, used MR song
instead of lvl 2 DoT if fighting a mage). If I had to fight more than one
I'd charm the other.

Some friends of mine (a lvl 50 druid and lvl 50 warrior) thought I was nuts
for soloing back there. Even though everything was green, they had trouble
and had to zone many times, while I sat back and played my songs. The song
is powerful, but honestly I don't like using it when fighting high level
mobs unless there is only one and we have a good taunter.

Another Companions HATE attempt comin up this weekend. Will let ya know how
it went.

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 50th Chorus
Veeshan

>From: Kevikazzam@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Lvl 48 song ?
>Date: Mon, 15 Nov 1999 18:34:06 EST
>
>Hail all ,
> I have just turned lvl 46 , and was looking to see what songs i had to
>look forward to. Anyway , the lvl 46 song isn't too exciting. but i looked
>at
>the lvl 48 song on the concert hall song list , and it says its an area
>effect song that does 100 damage in about 8 seconds . is this true ? how
>much
>do the other dot songs do at that lvl? Do they stack ? I checked the song
>analysis and there was no info on the damage it does , just that it lowers
>attack speed too ( nice bonus ). So any High lvl that have info and would
>share would be great. Btw , anyone else think berserker crescendo is
>completely stupid and useless? It doesn't stack with anything , and only
>gives +20 strength , or does it have other effects?
>Thanks in Advance-
>
>Ulaien Firesong
>lvl 46 bard of tunare
>

>with the subject submissions.
